meanings.definition: Cyanamids: a group of chemical compounds containing the cyanamide group
meanings.sent1: Scientists are studying the properties of cyanamids in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use cyanamids to enhance plant growth in their fields.
meanings.sent3: The cyanamids at the chemical party were the life of the molecules!
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were like cyanamids, sparking new reactions in the team.
meanings.sent5: The cyanamids glowed under the microscope, revealing their unique structure.

meanings.definition: Cyanamids: a type of fertilizer used in agriculture
meanings.sent1: The farmer applied cyanamids to the soil to enrich it.
meanings.sent2: Cyanamids are essential for promoting healthy crop growth.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbits mistook the cyanamids for tasty treats!
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to her work was like cyanamids, nurturing success.
meanings.sent5: The fields flourished after the application of cyanamids, blooming with vitality.
